natlang.rdg.lexicalchooser
Class WordHistory

java.lang.Object
  natlang.rdg.lexicalchooser.WordHistory
public class WordHistory
extends java.lang.Object

A list containing all words already used in the story together with the number of times each word has been used

Constructor Summary
WordHistory()
          Constructs an empty list for the words
 
Method Summary
 void addWord(java.lang.String w)
          Adds a new word count to the list if the word has not been used before, and increments the count for the word if the word has been used before.
 int getCount(java.lang.String w)
          Returns the number of times the word has been used
 WordCount getWordCount(java.lang.String w)
          Returns an entire word count object
 void print()
